entry.title: First braindump to introduce myself
entry.summary:
I'm the kind of guy that you would want on your IT team, especially when that team is involved with Linux in any way. With over 30 years of experience in IT and a very broad knowledge. Others consider me a Guru. That however is not how I would call myself ever.

As it states in my LinkedIn profile I'm a service oriented, process and procedure driven person.
